info.name: Dunia Internal API Documentation
info.description: This is dunia API documentation, for internal use only

item.name: Billing Address
item.description: Endpoint to manage customers billing address

request.description: Retrieve the billing addresses associated with the currently authenticated user.

item.name:
Create billing address
Store a new billing address for the currently authenticated user.

Update billing address
Update an existing billing address for the currently authenticated user.
Display the specific category by ID.
Handle the email verification process for the authenticated user.

variable.description: The ID of the verify email.

request.description: Mark the authenticated user's email address as verified.

item.name: Send an email verification notification to the user or redirect if email is already verified.
Send a password reset link to the user's email address.

request.description: Handle an incoming password reset link request.

item.name: Handle a new password request for password reset.
Retrieve a paginated list of orders for the currently authenticated customer.

Process the checkout for placing an order.
Store a new product with related information and files.

The ID of the product's author.

item.name: Update the specified resource in storage.
Retrieve a paginated list of products with optional filters.

query.description: Search for products by name (partial match).
